plot: A series of 14 two-reel episodes, each complete in itself, involving the exploits of J. Rufus Wallingford and Blackie Daw, con men extraordinaire.
title: The New Adventures of J. Rufus Wallingford

original_name: The New Adventures of J. Rufus Wallingford
